properties.entry: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM( SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, MEMBER_NO, READ_COUNT, CREATE_DATE FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_STATUS = 'Y' AND TYPE_NO = ? ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, MEMBER_NO, NICKNAME, ISSUE_DATE, CREATE_DATE, READ_COUNT, BOARD_CONTENT FROM BOARD JOIN MEMBER USING (MEMBER_NO) WHERE BOARD_NO = ? AND BOARD_STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT COUNT(*) as cnt FROM BOARD WHERE TYPE_NO = ? AND BOARD_STATUS='Y'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_STATUS = 'Y' AND MEMBER_NO = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) as cnt FROM BOARD JOIN BOARD_TYPE USING(TYPE_NO) WHERE TYPE_NO = ? AND BOARD_STATUS='Y' AND( MEMBER_NO=? OR 2=?)

SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROWNUM AS "RNUM", A.* FROM( SELECT B.BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, CREATE_DATE, READ_COUNT, TYPE_NO FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON B.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO WHERE B.MEMBER_NO = ? AND BOARD_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROWNUM AS "RNUM", A.* FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN REPLY_CONTENT IS NULL THEN '답변전' ELSE '답변완료' END AS "RESULTSTATUS", B.BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, MEMBER_NAME, CREATE_DATE FROM BOARD B JOIN BOARD_TYPE USING(TYPE_NO) JOIN MEMBER M on B.MEMBER_NO=M.MEMBER_NO LEFT JOIN REPLY R on B.BOARD_NO = R.BOARD_NO WHERE BOARD_NAME = '문의' AND(B.MEMBER_NO=? OR 2=?) AND BOARD_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
INSERT INTO BOARD(BOARD_NO,MEMBER_NO, TYPE_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_STATUS,FILE_COUNT,ISSUE_DATE) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ? ,'Y',?,?)
INSERT INTO BOARD(BOARD_NO,MEMBER_NO, TYPE_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_STATUS,FILE_COUNT,CATEGORY_NO) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ? ,'Y',?,?)
UPDATE BOARD SET READ_COUNT = READ_COUNT + 1 WHERE BOARD_NO = ? AND BOARD_STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT BOARD_NO, CATEGORY_NAME, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, MEMBER_ID, CREATE_DATE FROM BOARD B LEFT JOIN CATEGORY USING(CATEGORY_NO) JOIN MEMBER USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE BOARD_NO = ? AND (MEMBER_NO=? or 2=?) AND B.BOARD_STATUS = 'Y'
UPDATE BOARD SET CATEGORY_NO = ? ,BOARD_TITLE = ? ,BOARD_CONTENT = ? WHERE BOARD_NO = ?
UPDATE BOARD SET BOARD_STATUS = 'N' WHERE BOARD_NO = ?
